definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: The refuge in the buddhist or says buddhists.
sentences.chinese: 皈依三宝的人是佛教徒或称佛弟子。

sentences.english: It appears a short moment after he overtakes the Volvo: the omen.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒超车过了沃尔沃没多久，预兆出现了。

sentences.english: PLKN participator queue up to bath Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒国民服务学员排队浴佛。

sentences.english: But he is a Buddhist, and Buddhists have expanding souls.
sentences.chinese: 但他确实是佛教徒，而佛教徒们有着具包容力的灵魂。

sentences.english: But he is a Buddhist, and Buddhists have expanding souls.
sentences.chinese: 但他确实是佛教徒，而佛教徒们有着具包容力的灵魂。

sentences.english: For the early Buddhists, karma was non-linear.
sentences.chinese: 对早期佛教徒来说，业力是非线性的。

sentences.english: In most Buddhist traditions, he is considered the Supreme Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 传统上，大多数佛教徒认为他是至圣佛陀。

sentences.english: Buddhists call it the 'Buddhist Country of Lotus Flowers'.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒称之为莲花佛国。

sentences.english: The Buddhist is driving on an astral body and he is heading in the direction of the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒驾车走在星体上，驶向天堂的方向。

sentences.english: What he sees there is a Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 他在镜中看到的是一名佛教徒。

sentences.english: She was a devout Buddhist , and spent money lavishly on the construction of temples.
sentences.chinese: 同时她也是一位虔诚的佛教徒，耗费巨资修建寺院。

sentences.english: The blossom lotus symbolized the prospering country.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒称之为莲花佛国。

sentences.english: You couldn’t say the Berlingo was a sexy car, the Buddhist thinks.
sentences.chinese: 你不大可能把贝林戈看做是性感的车，佛教徒想着。

sentences.english: “The only difference between Buddhas and ordinary beings is discipline.” – Tulku Urgyen Rinpoche (1920 – 1996) a great Buddhist meditation master.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒和普通人唯一的区别就是自制力。

sentences.english: And almost everyone disliked Muslims and Buddhists more than any other group.
sentences.chinese: 而穆斯林和佛教徒几乎是众矢之的，没人待见。

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
